channel.title: Star Wars Galaxies
channel.description: Does anyone play or played Star Wars Galaxies I was wondering whether to get it. Also how do you pay for the monthly subscription in the UK and how much is it? Thanks.

item.title: Star Wars Galaxies
item.dc:creator: @hungry_tree hungry_tree
item.description:
@hungry_tree wrote:

galaxies is a really good game though there are some flaws. like after a new patch jedis , who are the best race, become too easy and now over populated. also in the expansion packhas a weird timesetting, when beeing set in the original trilogy but having clones and droids etc.

all in all its a really good game personally i believe its just as good as wow, but that may be because im a big star wars fan!!

Read full topic

item.title: Star Wars Galaxies
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“GuNtRiX, post:4, topic:118680”]Thanks James.
Where did you get the information about paying?

[quote author=MybJames link=topic=168055.msg1568473#msg1568473 date=1183557316]
Hello, looked this up on google.

Month-to-month - $14.99
Three months - $14.00 per month
Six months - $13.00 per month
12 months - $12.00 per month.

That’s in USD (american dollars), so if you were to pay month-to-month in pounds it would equal to 7.42798 Pounds.
Any furthur money convertion questions you can refer to http://www.xe.com/ucc

The actual game client in itself costs $20 USD, you work it out
[/quote][/quote]

I looked on google, typed in something like “Star wars galaxies monthly payment”

Read full topic

Hello, looked this up on google.

Month-to-month - $14.99
Three months - $14.00 per month

That’s in USD (american dollars), so if you were to pay month-to-month in pounds it would equal to 7.42798 Pounds.
